doc:
Estelle Brody https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estelle_Brody 0 Estelle Brody (15 August 1900 – 3 June 1995) was an American actress who became one of the biggest female stars of British silent film in the latter half of the 1920s. Her career was then derailed by a series of ill-advised decisions and she disappeared from sight for many years before re-emerging between the late 1940s and the 1960s in smaller supporting film and television roles. Estelle_Brody ( 15_August_1900 – 3_June_1995 ) was an_American_actress who became one of the_biggest_female_stars of British_silent_film in the_latter_half of the_1920s .
